body.name: WenVen Women's Winter Thicken Puffer Coat Warm Jacket with Faux Fur Removable Hood
features: Fabric type Material -- Shell: 100% polyester; Insulation: 100% synthetic insulation

Sealed against cold weather - Filled with a thick layer of insulation, a stand collar, protective double enclosure, and windproof ribbed cuffs, this womens winter coat is designed for optimal warmth and comfort!
Protects against light rain - Rated 5000mm on the waterproof index, this warm women's coat features an outer shell with a DWR finish and transparent film that protects you against snow and drizzles.

Head to thigh warmth - When used, the detachable hood lined with a removable faux-fur trim gives additional warmth and protection for your head, neck, and ears. Perfect for when you're walking outdoors.

Convenient pockets - Button snapped side pockets keep your phones, IDs and wallet safe while the soft fleece pocket lining keeps your hands warm. A 2-way front zipper unzips from the bottom for cooling off and better mobility.

A flattering silhouette - Tailored to accentuate your shapely figure, this ladies long winter coat boasts a stylish slim-fit that hugs your waist, so you still look stunning even when you're bundled up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous Feature Rich Warm Coat!
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a great winter coat with certain features for a long time and this one did not disappoint! For reference I'm 5'3", 149 lbs with a 42" bustline and I normally wear a large. I purchased the large and it fits perfectly, with room to layer underneath it. I did not need to size up. The features I was after were a removable hood, tall collar, wind proof zipper flap, two way zipper, long length (yet not a midi or maxi length), welt pockets without a zipper, and ribbed trim around the cuffs. The flaps on the front pockets tuck nicely (flat) inside the flannel lined pocket and there's no scrapping your hands across a metal zipper every time you put your hands in the pockets. The fur isn't high quality, but a bit of fluffing and it will probably be okay. If not, you can easily remove the fur. As far as quality, the fabric is nice, the weight is hefty and craftsmanship is excellent. At your normal size, this jacket is form fitting, not boxy. If I had sized up, it would have been boxy on me. The durable synthetic fill will allow you to easily wash this jacket in the washing machine. Like most puffer coats it's a bit bulky however, it's a very comfortable jacket to wear and it is super warm! Last but not least, I got this jacket during a deal day sale and paid less than $70.00 for it making it a great value at this price point. I looks like it was much more expensive than it really was. If you're on the fence about this purchase, order your normal size and try it on! You won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice heavy coat
reviews.reviewText: This coat was much heavier and warmer than I had expected for the price. It’s nicely well-made, the first came very wrinkled. I needed a little bit of steaming and fluffing with a hairbrush to get it to look like for instead of really artificial, but it looks really nice. Haven’t tried it out yet in cold weather, but this is a much longer coat than I was also expecting I expected it to hit just a low the wall Hip line but it’s mid to high. The size runs a little small. We ordered an extra large, but could’ve actually gone a little bigger than that for a 5’6 180 pound person. But there is a bottom zipper that you can lift to give you a wider range of motion. I felt like I did not have a lot of flattering aspects and was more straight sided. Then I would have light but since it’s here I will keep it. I wish it had a belt or something to add an accent around the waist, but as it is, it will be a nice heavy duty coat. I don’t think I will want to wear this every day because I do feel the movement is a little restricted, but I was expecting a very lightweight coat and I’m glad that this is heavier built. It has some weight to it so if you’re sensitive about the weight of your outerwear, you may consider that . It would be really difficult to pack this coat being as the fill is really fluffy it says polyester, but it feels more like down. I don’t know how it will wash up but I don’t in planned to find out it says surface wash, and for the most part, that is what we will do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a warm coat for this winter and being a smaller stature woman of a certain age, I didn't want one that would make me look like the Michelin tire man. I liked the look of this pretty blue and took a chance on ordering it. I am so pleased with it. It's warm but not overly "fluffly", a very pretty color, and is long enough to cover my posterior without making me look like I'm wearing a sleeping bag. The hood is overlarge, but I don't think most women wear the hood anyway. It's the whole hair thing. After receiving this coat, I actually ordered another in the coffee color and love it, too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty nice for the price
reviews.reviewText: So I asked for a fairly expensive jacket for Christmas but ended up getting a much better gift so I still needed a jacket 😆 This came up as a sale and for the price I couldn’t not try it. It’s actually real nice and I love it. It’s thick, warm and looks good; the only thing is it’s not at all form fitting. It’s rather boxy but that’s fine with me. I’m a 160lbs and 5’3” and got a large based on the reviews and it’s perfect. I actually couldn’t be happier with it. It came a bit wrinkled and you need to fluff the fur a little but it fills out right away. Super cute, warm and great for the price. I live in NewEngland and today it about 32 degrees and it’s nice and warm. 🥶I highly recommend this jacket.EDIT: I’ve not warn this coat in 10 degree days and it’s AMAZING!! I think it’s actually one of the warmest jackets I’ve ever purchased and I’m a big skier (not wearing it skiing) but definitely apres.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality for the price!
reviews.reviewText: For the price, this jacket is awesome! I bought it because I urgently needed a winter coat after the zipper on my prior jacket broke. I find it to be very warm. I have worn it in temperatures as low as 15° and felt warm and insulated. There are two things that could be better, though. First, the hood is oversized. For that reason, it hangs down over my eyes so it's not very functional; I usually end up wearing a hat instead. Also, the zipper is a bit fiddly as you have to insert it exactly right for it to zip up.I ordered a size large and it is a little loose on me and the sleeves are a little too long. However, I think a medium would have been too tight around my hips. For reference, my measurements are as follows: 43" hip, 33" waist, 38" bust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm, cozy & stylish
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love my cozy and stylish navy blue puffer coat. It’s comfortable and offers warmth without compromising on style. I feel that it's true to size for a perfect fit. The fur on the hood is cute and adds extra protection against the chill.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just not for me
reviews.reviewText: (Ordered a size 3X) I am a 5’2” 260Lb women with a “apron belly” and it was snug. I would have kept it but my dislikes were for other reasons despite the fit. The jacket seems great for weather but the pockets were too small to fit my phone in (iphone14). Also the hood was too big even when buttoning the snaps. When I pulled it over my head it covered all the way down to my chin. Hope this helps someone with their decision on this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Normally L and the XL fit like a glove
reviews.reviewText: High-quality look and feel, sleeves a great length, shoulders nice and roomy, all mechanisms worked perfectly. I removed the fur trim for more of a lululemon look. I love this coat! Perfectly warm and cozy coat for 0c and layering for colder days in 🇨🇦!

reviews.reviewTitle: ***This jacket is Definitely made for covering Canadian Winters***
reviews.reviewText: I liked absolutely everything about this jacket except, I was looking for something a bit longer and the large fit too big. The seller was great in accepting it back, once I provided my shipping receipt, Thanks!

reviews.reviewTitle: The warmth of this coat is unreal!
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about ordering a winter coat online but let me tell you im sure glad i did. this coat is absolutely beautiful. It fits perfectly and I am 5’9 205 lbs an xl is perfect.It’s heavy, very warm, long enough to cover the but area. I would highly recommend this purchase.
This coat was absolutely beautiful and keeps you very warm. I would recommend this coat to anyone.
The seam ripped in the pocket after the first wear. It’s comfortable and warm. I got what I paid for.
